mapper.update: UPDATE TB_Mngr SET useYn = #{useYn}, email = #{email}, pw = #{pw}, mngrNm = #{mngrNm}, phone = #{phone}, tel = #{tel}, zip = #{zip}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, addr3 = #{addr3}, addr4 = #{addr4}, authPersn = #{authPersn}, authRsltView = #{authRsltView}, authAdmin = #{authAdmin}, authLogView = #{authLogView}, authStati = #{authStati}, authBbs = #{authBbs}, authOrg = #{authOrg}, uptId = #{uptId}, uptDt = #{uptDt} WHERE MngrId = #{mngrId}
